title: Alessandro
text: I work as a PhD student in the Annalisa Bracco’s group at the Georgia Institute of Technology. My studies focus on using manifold learning an deep learning to better understand and represent the dynamics of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC). In the past I also worked on advancing the understanding of tropical-to-extra-tropical atmospherical circulation.

title: Alessandro
text:
Education
Before starting my PhD I worked for one year at the ICTP as a junior researcher. I obtained my MSc in Physics at the University of Trieste, and my BSc in Physics at the La Sapienza University of Rome.
